text: Butch Huskey was a professional baseball player for the New York Mets. He started playing Major League Baseball in 1993. He was born in Anadarko, Oklahoma. He weighs around 244 pounds and 6'03 in height. Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:American baseball players Category:New York Mets players Category:Sportspeople from Oklahoma
title: Butch Huskey
